Name: The MisAdventures of Xenos
About the game: Welcome to 'The MisAdventures of Xenos,' a hilarious parody of classic fantasy RPGs! In this turn-based adventure, you play as Princess Fayne, who sets out to rescue her hero, Xenos, after he is kidnapped by one of the Demon Lord's underlings. With Fayne as the protagonist, this game turns the typical hero-rescues-princess trope on its head and gives players a fresh and entertaining perspective. Prepare for an epic quest filled with crude humor and ridiculous antics as Fayne battles her way through a world of danger and mischief. The game features a classic turn-based combat system that pays homage to the RPGs of the past, complete with challenging bosses and a variety of strategic options to master. With a retro-inspired 2D art style, there's plenty of visual charm to complement the game's irreverent humor. 'The MisAdventures of Xenos' features meta jokes and fourth-wall-breaking humor that will keep you on your toes, as well as dark humor that may push the boundaries of good taste. 'The MisAdventures of Xenos' features a new game+ mode with a what-if quest line, adding even more content for players to enjoy. With numerous quests to complete, a full clear, of a single playthrough, taking around 6 hours, and a female protagonist who defies genre conventions, 'The MisAdventures of Xenos' offers a fresh take on classic RPGs. Whether you're a fan of turn-based combat or just looking for a good laugh, 'The MisAdventures of Xenos' is sure to deliver an unforgettable gaming experience. So grab your sword and get ready to join Princess Fayne on an adventure you won't soon forget! Controls There is an in-game configuration tool for you to customize the controls as you wish, but here are the defaults: Z to confirm X to go back Arrow keys to move the characters Shift to walk F2 displays the FPS counter F3 fits game to window F4 toggles fullscreen mode F5 resets
